subSubSection.paragraph:
Host records.
Liriomyza
spp.,
Phytomyza
spp. (
Avinent and Jiménez 1987
). In Finland , it is reported from Agromyzidae ( Diptera ):

on

L.,

Zetterstedt, 1838
